choose.when: insert into tbl_member(member_email, profile_img_url, member_status) values (#{memberEmail},#{profileImgUrl}, #{memberStatus})

mapper.select: SELECT id, profile_name, profile_nickname, profile_gender, profile_age, profile_email, profile_phone, profile_etc, member_id, created_date, updated_date FROM tbl_member_profile WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

select mp.profile_name, mp.profile_nickname, mp.profile_gender, mp.profile_age, mp.profile_email, mp.profile_phone, mp.profile_etc, mp.member_id, mp.created_date, mp.updated_date, m.id, m.member_status from tbl_member_profile mp join tbl_member m on mp.member_id = m.id and m.member_status = 'YES' and m.id = #{id};
